posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rick McQuillan
Hi folks,
I have some T206's for sale.  PayPal, check or money order are all fine.  Please email me at rickmcquillan@gmail.com


The 25 (5 sold 20 remaining) commons are $20 (price now dropped to $18 each).  All prices include shipping. Insurance is free with purchases of $100 or more.  Feel free to make offers for the entire group or a partial group.

McIntyre is SOLD
Rucker is SOLD
Sullivan is SOLD
Manning is SOLD
Pfeister is SOLD

The 7 cards at the bottom of the page are:

Bresnahan     $45 now $40
Kelly         $55 now $50 SOLD
Marquard      $40 SOLD
McGinnity     $55 now $50 SOLD
McGraw Hip    $45 now $40
McGraw Finger $55 SOLD
Willis        $45 SOLD

Thank you,
Rick
